name: Job Failed Successfully [JAM PROTOTYPE]
description:
JOB FAILED SUCCESSFULLY

A game where you (the Player), does not want to go to work, so instead of saying you're sick or something, you destroy your entire office.

THIS VERSION OF THE GAME IS A PROTOTYPE MEANT FOR THE CCC JAM 2.0, AND THE GAME IS REALLY SHITTY LOL

CREDITS

A Crazy Town (me) - Programming & Art

DespawnedDiamond - Music
